Package gears.sidescroller.world.tiles

Class AbstractTileTemplate

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.tiles.AbstractTileTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicColorTile, ImageTile
public abstract class AbstractTileTemplate extends Object implements JsonSerializable
Tiles are immobile, immutable squares on a map. Tiles are used as Flyweights by TileMap, so they needn't internalize their coordinates, as such data is externalized in the TileMap.

    • drawAt

      public abstract AbstractTileTemplate drawAt(Graphics g, int x, int y)
      Renders this AbstractTileTemplate at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics to render on
      x - the x-coordinate where this tile should be drawn, measured in pixel-space.
      y - the y-coordinate where this tile should be drawn, measured in pixel-space.
      Returns:
      this, for chaining purposes.
